skill.name: lead-research-assistant
skill.description: Identifies high-quality leads for your product or service by analyzing your business, searching for target companies, and providing actionable contact strategies. Perfect for sales, business development, and marketing professionals.
skill.summary: Identifies high-quality leads for your product or service by analyzing your business, searching for ...
skill.author: ComposioHQ

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown instructions. No executable code, no file system access, no network calls, no environment variable access, and no external commands. The skill provides guidance to AI assistants on how to help users research and identify business leads.

content.user_title: Find and qualify business leads with AI
content.value_statement: Finding qualified leads requires hours of research across multiple sources. This skill automates lead discovery by analyzing your product, identifying matching companies, and providing prioritized contact strategies for each prospect.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes your product or service to understand value proposition and target market
Identifies companies matching your ideal customer profile based on industry, size, and location
Researches and scores leads based on fit score, signals of need, and budget indicators
Provides personalized contact strategies including decision-maker roles and conversation starters
Gathers relevant information about prospects including LinkedIn profiles and company news
Formats results in clear, scannable output ready for CRM import
limitations: Does not directly access paid databases or CRM systems
Cannot verify email addresses or make direct contact attempts
Results depend on publicly available information quality
Does not integrate with external tools for automatic outreach

use_cases.title: Build targeted prospect lists
use_cases.description: Identify and prioritize companies that match your ideal customer profile with scored recommendations.

use_cases.title: Find partnership opportunities
use_cases.description: Discover companies for strategic partnerships based on complementary products and market alignment.

use_cases.title: Research target accounts
use_cases.description: Prepare for account-based marketing campaigns with detailed company research and messaging strategies.

prompt_templates.title: Basic lead search
prompt_templates.prompt: I'm building [product description]. Find me 10 companies in [location/industry] that would be good leads for this.

prompt_templates.title: Codebase analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Look at what I'm building in this repository and identify the top 10 companies in [location/industry] that would benefit from this product.

prompt_templates.title: Detailed ICP research
prompt_templates.prompt: My product: [description]. Ideal customer profile: Industry [X], Company size [Y], Location [Z], Pain points [list]. Find me 20 qualified leads with contact strategies.

prompt_templates.title: Follow-up research
prompt_templates.prompt: Research these companies in more detail and provide additional context: [list of company names]. Include recent news, hiring trends, and tech stack indicators.

best_practices: Be specific about your product's unique value and the problems it solves for customers.
Run from your codebase directory for automatic product context when applicable.
Provide clear constraints like industry, company size, and location for better targeting.
anti_patterns: Using vague product descriptions that make it hard to identify target companies.
Skipping the ideal customer profile definition, which reduces result relevance.
Requesting too many leads at once without prioritizing specific criteria.

faq.question: What tools does this skill work with?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It uses their web search and analysis capabilities.

faq.question: How many leads can I find at once?
faq.answer:: You can request any number, but 10-20 leads provides the best balance of quality and depth per lead.

faq.question: Does it connect to CRM systems?
faq.answer: No, this skill provides research and strategies. You can export results to CSV for manual CRM import.

faq.question: Is my product information kept private?
faq.answer: Yes, your product context is only used for lead research within your current session.

faq.question: Why are some leads missing contact details?
faq.answer: Results depend on publicly available information. Some leads may lack verified email or LinkedIn URLs.

faq.question: How is this different from manual research?
faq.answer: It synthesizes information faster and provides structured scoring, but results should be verified for accuracy.
